description: Number of Hamiltonian rooted triangulations with n internal nodes and 4 external nodes.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: P. N. Rathie, The enumeration of Hamiltonian polygons in rooted planar triangulations, Discrete Math., 6 (1973), 163-168.
formula: a(n) = f(n, 4) where f(n, k) is defined in A003122. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 02 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms and title clarified by _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 02 2015
